content.question: In lines 10-11 (De...obligarer), what does Pliny attempt to do?

choices.label: Treat his mistake as a benefit
Show that he is a capable governor
Blame his mistake on someone else
Complain about his obligations to Trajan

content.answer: Treat his mistake as a benefit

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
